name: HERO Allstars ~ Okami Quest
description:
!! Alert !!

This game is not translated into English. 

We recommend playing only those who know Korean well.

Summary

Rebecca City, the city with the most advanced science in the central world in 20XX ....

Behind the dark side was the genius fighter engineer Hoo, who called Deus Ex Machina.

One day, Rebecca's organization, Doom, coveted her, decided to hire her, but she was comfortable working alone.

But Doom, who wanted to get her somehow, eventually kidnaps her ...

 
But there was something they overlooked! Hoo had a his daughter Okami!

Will Okami be able to recover her mother against them?

Introduce

RPG maker game made with top view shooting.

Casual, tactical and hidden two difficulty levels.

Find the hidden elements, overcome adversity and hardship, and save Hoo!

Feedback / bug reports / actions are always welcome.

Game Version : 1.0
